article.description: Rodney Bullock had career highs of 24 points and grabbed 10 rebounds to lead Providence to a 94-73 win over Brown on Saturday night.
article.headline: Bullock leads Providence to 94-73 win over Brown
article.linkText: Bullock leads Providence to 94-73 win over Brown
article.story: PROVIDENCE, R.I. -- Rodney Bullock had career highs of 24 points and grabbed 10 rebounds to lead Providence to a 94-73 win over Brown on Saturday night. Freshman Ryan Fazekas added 17 points, making 5 of 8 3-pointers, and Jalen Lindsey added 14 off the bench on 5-of-7 shooting for the Friars (3-0), who shot 57 percent for the game. Jason Massey and Travis Fuller had 12 each for the Bears (1-3), who won last year's matchup 77-67. Ricky Council II hit a 3-pointer late in the first half to give Providence a 45-35 lead. Early in the second half the Friars used a 12-0 to go up 58-38. They shot 65 percent in the second half to maintain a comfortable margin, pushing it up to 28 with 3:32 left. Providence finished with 26 assists on 33 baskets with Kris Dunn getting 10 to go with his 11 points and seven rebounds.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
